Room.Name: Performers' Tent
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing amidst carnival performers in the performers tent.
Room.LongDescription: Wow! What a view! Topless female acrobats, muscular master trapeze artists, funny clowns in underwear, contortionists looking for their backs, maintenance men trying to pick up on the cabaret orchestra, a nosy kid peeking behind the bearded lady's dress, midgets, another nosy kid trying to steal a snake charmer's flute and various other spectacles better left unmentioned.
